Spirit Guardians Information

Description: Call forth spirits to protect the area around you. Nearby enemies take 3~24 Radiant damage or 3~24 Necrotic damage per turn, and their movement speed is halved. On Save: Targets still take half damage. Caster can't become Invisible while concentrating on this spell. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: Self 3m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: Wisdom
